message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first.  I think it would be very valuable to you.  Given its unique value, I'm offering it at a price of $20,000.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. That said, $12,000 is significantly below its value.  Could you do $17,000?
I understand that the product has value, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $12,000 and $17,000, so how about $14,500?
